name: bigbluefreedivingadvanture
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big blue freediving advanture
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We introduce an information of freediving news, skills you can practice and place you can enjoy it.

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, big blue freediving advanture” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, big blue freediving advanture"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, big blue freediving advanture."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the big blue freediving advanture board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
